title: Help I'm getting a RADS Error
body: It wont let me launch my client but I launched it this morning and it worked fine.

replies.body: Which specific RADS error are you seeing? There are many and each one requires a different fix.
open command prompt and type "ipconfig /flushdns" if that doesnt work try closing nvidia control panel and playsTV if you have those installed.
Releasing IP on my router then flushing my DNS fixed it for me

Fix for RADS error patch 6.23 self.leagueoflegends
submitted 1 시간 전 * by 55redditor55
I had this problem randomly but I finally found a solution, all thanks goes to "feedlord" from EUW
Since changing your DNS server over to googles isn’t solving the issue as it looks like an issue with riots DNS server at the moment there is another way to fix it.
What we need to do is to tell windows to not lookup the ip address for l3cdn.riotgames.com but instead tell it the ip address.
Step 1 : Click on the start menu and type “notepad”
Step 2 : Right click on notepad and choose “Run as administrator”
Step 3 : Go to File – Open and navigate to the folder “C:Windows/System32/drivers/etc” (you may need to change where is says “text files” just above the open button to “all files”) and open the file named “hosts”
Step 4 : Add the line “23.74.24.114 l3cdn.riotgames.com” to the bottom of the file and save.
Hey presto open the LoL client and you should be good to go.
EDIT NOTE: Remember to come back and delete this line as it will cause issues if riot changes the ip of their server in the future.

The solution that worked for me: resetting my router. Not just unplugging it, waiting, and plugging it back in -- but actually holding down on the reset button with a pen for ~10 seconds. At least for me, that did the trick.

I left my client on and saw a movie.. returned back to having random errors with the client starting up and failing saying that it reverted to an older update of the client trying to re-update and then it has an error and asks to restart or shutdown. Neither option works. Eventually I just uninstalled and tried to re-install.

Now every time I launch the client the league of legends logo pops up and then a white popup box says RADS Error - unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information.

I likewise played earlier today but now am also receiving a RADS error.

The system status page notes, "We're aware of a problem causing login attempts to fail, and are working on a fix."
